Question: Korea ICT Association (KICTA) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SK Telecom

Urban Air Mobility (UAM), Sapeon AI processor, Litmus Plus, virtual power plant technology using renewable energy, Magic Carpet, Sapeon X330 processor, core AI technologies, semiconductor technologies, next-generation AI data center model offering full-stack data center technologies.
Summary_cn:
SK电信

城市空中交通（UAM），Sapeon人工智能处理器，Litmus Plus，利用可再生能源的虚拟电厂技术，魔毯（Magic Carpet），Sapeon X330处理器，核心人工智能技术，半导体技术，全新一代AI数据中心模型提供全套数据中心技术。
